item.title: SQL self join use case
item.description: How to query on timeseries data based on time window? Suppose I have the following time series data: I want to calculate mean, std value inside a time window with the value of 2 for different name. I used to use spark to first group by name and then do the calculation in the list within the different group. This is actually quite fast. But I later on figured out that we can first self join based on the time window condition like below:
